messages.subject: oops, should've read ...
messages.msgSnippet: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ASL ...oops, sorry, that should ve read ... *btw, my dch think PRISSY is HYSTERICAL; yes, I have a complex!!!*  (well, now I REALLY DO
messages.messageBody:
Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ASL ...
oops, sorry, that should've read ... *btw, my dch think PRISSY is HYSTERICAL; yes, I have a complex!!!*  (well, now I REALLY DO and I don't have sticky keys to blame my goof on, either) hehe ...
 
Pris ~> good night all :O (yawn) 
----- Original Message -----
From: Pris
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 11:41 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pris

lol, I remember begging my mother when I was in the 3rd grade to PLEASE let me change my name to somethng SHORTER NAME b/c my German surname was = as long and both were just TOO MUCH TO WRITE ... ohhhhhhh how I wanted to be called Ann or Deb, something SIMPLE!!!  of course, I LOATHED my nickname, still do to this day ~> *Prissy*, as in Prissy~pants ... only my mother, sisters and the preacher's wife get away w/ calling me THAT today ... LOL!!! ... my dch btw, PRISSY is HYSTERICAL; yes, I have a complex!!!  ... so, Pris is short for Priscilla, I use it b/c I'm too lazy to write/type my long name out everytime <SMILES> ...
 
Pris/aka/lazybones
 
----- Original Message -----
From: panchot
To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 10:44 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pris

Pris......how is that pronounced.  Am I missing something? Is it really obvious? Argh, I am ALWAYS having my name mispronounced, and I keep seeing Pris wondering how you pronounce it....Sorry if the answer to this is obvious and I'm just not seeing it....
